CustomField.description: Used to combine values the separate fields used in either single or multi institution collaborations to one field for reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Cost_Agreed_RollUp__c != 0 || Total_Cost_Agreed_RollUp__c != null, Total_Cost_Agreed_RollUp__c, Total_Cost_Agreed__c )
CustomField.label: Total Cost - Agreed
